Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This product holds immense value to me, but I am confident it will be an unparalleled asset to your endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, we believe it is worth $850,000. We understand its significance to you and hope this offer reflects our commitment to providing you with the best possible experience.

Should you choose to accept this offer, we promise a seamless transaction process and dedicated support throughout the entire journey. If you require any additional information or have concerns, please do not hesitate to reach out to us.

Looking forward to the possibility of bringing this product into your world,
Alice 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $850,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $850,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
